title: Mascots
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Gunsolo

So, after podcast discussions last night, I've been thinking a fair bit about mascots. Ultimately, if you guys had your pick, who would you say would be the mascot for MotA? And what other mascots are you guys fond of?

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: The most obvious answer is Lesbian Elf Kisses.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Panel 1: Mandrake notices that the windows are so dirty that I was able to write my name on them.

I'd pick Mandrake or William as the MotA mascot, as they both show how otherworldly the setting is.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I agree with the gecko. Of course.... now I'm picturing Mandrake in a cheerleader outfit...BAD!! BAD ADAMAS!!! :P

replies.author: misa*Guest*
replies.text:
J Gray's avatar. 

Kidding! Mandrake's pretty awesome, and I always remember Blue since it's the first to speak to Theresa after her first universe hop. Dokeyokay?

replies.author: Jasae Bushae*Guest*
replies.text: I vote either lesbian elf kisses or Mandrake
